phrs.translation: 碎纸机，废纸撕碎机；粒状碎纸机

sentences.sentence: As a result, commercial paper shredders are common in business of all sizes.
sentences.translation: 因此，商业碎纸机是常见的商业的所有大小。

sentences.sentence: It is possible to buy new or second hand shredders and even refurbished ones.
sentences.translation: 这是有可能购买新的或二手碎纸机，甚至翻新的。

sentences.sentence: There are rugged commercial paper shredders available that can macerate virtually any document.
sentences.translation: 有坚固的商业碎纸机，可以提供几乎任何沤文件。
